name: otters-chicken-presents-crawfish-jumbalaya
title: Otter’s Chicken Presents: Crawfish & Jumbalaya?
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
Did you miss the Merrell Crawfish Boil earlier this month? Never fear, Cajunfest is here! In its 5th year, the Music City Cajunfest is really just a fancy name for friends, music, crawfish, jumbalaya, beer, music, and good times. And it’s only $25 for all you can eat food and 2 beer tickets. We know a good deal when we hear one, and this is a good deal. Get your tickets before the 30th at this price, or it’s $30 at the door! [Limelight at 201 Woodland Street, across from LP Field. 2pm.]
